disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Duelist's Dance.

effect radius.value: 1200 1350 / 250

blurb.value: Fiora challenges nearby enemy Champions to dodge her. She calls out a direction from which she will try to strike. If she can complete her own challenge, she receives a small bonus and calls out a new direction.

description.value: Innate: Fiora identifies the Vitals of nearby visible enemy champions, marked as an arc around themselves. Vitals take 1.75 seconds to become targetable and linger for 13.25 seconds afterwards while Fiora remains near the target. After a Vital is triggered or times out, Fiora identifies a new one on her target.

description2.value: Fiora's successful basic attacks and damaging abilities against a Vital trigger it to deal 2.5% (+ 4.5% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health  bonus true damage, heal Fiora for 40 − 115 (based on level) and grant her 20 / 30 / 40 / 50% (based on Grand Challenge's Rank)  bonus movement speed that decays over 1.5 seconds.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The Vitals are visible to all units. Damaging item actives and Luden's Echo count for triggering Vitals if they hit vitals facing Fiora. A Vital's angle is fixed to the champion's model and doesn't interact with its orientation. PENDING FOR TEST: Vital's interactions with dodging, blocking, and blinding effects via basic attack.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Lunge.

target range.value: 360 / 50 / 420

blurb.value: Fiora lunges in a direction and stabs a nearby enemy, dealing physical damage and applying on-hit effects.

description.value: Active: Fiora dashes a short distance in the target direction then stabs a nearby enemy if one is present. Lunge can damage structures and wards. Stabbing an enemy reduces Lunge's  cooldown by 50%.

description2.value: The stab deals physical damage and applies on-hit effects.

description3.value: Lunge hits enemies regardless of having sight of them or not.

description4.value: Fiora's other abilities can be cast during the dash without cancelling it.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Lunge deals basic damage, but also triggers spell effects by dealing an additional 0 spell damage. Lunge cannot critically strike. Lunge does not apply on-attack effects apart from certain exceptions. It does apply Energized as if it was an on-hit effect. It does not stack Guinsoo's Rageblade nor trigger Phantom Hit. The stab prioritizes in order of: Enemy champion affected by Grand Challenge. Vitals facing Fiora. Champions who would die to the strike. The nearest champion (based on center range). Enemies that would die to the strike. The closest enemy. Structures Wards. Lunge will not attempt to strike Jungle Plants. Fiora does not need sight of a target to stab it. Fiora does not stab if the dash is interrupted. Fiora cannot cast or buffer Flash during the dash. Fiora can cast Hextech Protobelt-01 during the dash, potentinally interrupting it based on the timing, preventing the stab if it does. The dash can pass through walls. Will land (priority order unchanged) even if Fiora dies. Lunge's dash speed is affected by movement speed.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Riposte.

width.value: 140

blurb.value: Fiora parries all incoming damage and disables for a short time, then stabs in a direction. This stab slows the first enemy champion hit, or stuns them if Fiora blocked an immobilizing effect with this ability.

description.value: Active: Fiora poises to strike in the target direction for 0.75 seconds, during which she's unable to act but parries any incoming sources of non-turret damage as well as gains crowd control immunity and debuff immunity.

description2.value: After the duration, Fiora sends a shock forward with her sword, dealing magic damage to enemies in a line.

description3.value: The first enemy champion struck is also slowed and crippled by 50% for 2 seconds. If Fiora parries at least one immobilizing effect, Riposte stuns the target for the same duration instead.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Riposte does not resist nearsight. Fiora is respected by executing effects during Riposte (she will not take damage from them). Immobilizing effects include those from Blast Cone and epic monsters. Debuff immunity includes summoner spells, such as Exhaust and Ignite, as well as damage over time and other effects. Spell shield will also prevent Vitals from being triggered. Riposte takes priority if Fiora is being protected by a spell shield. It does not take priority if she has a source of crowd control immunity other than her own (i.e. Black Shield). Shields take priority over Riposte.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Bladework.

blurb.value: Fiora has increased attack speed for the next two attacks. The first attack slows the target, and the second attack will critically strike.

description.value: Active: Fiora's next two basic attacks on-attack within 4 seconds gain  25 bonus range and  bonus attack speed.

description2.value: The first attack slows the target by 30% for 1 second but cannot critically strike. The second attack will critically strike for  reduced critical damage (including to structures).

description3.value: Bladework resets Fiora's basic attack timer.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Infinity Edge is not affected by the critical damage reduction and will increase the damage by 25% AD, instead of multiplying it by 112.5%. Spell shield will only block the slow from the first hit. PENDING FOR TEST: Bladework's interaction with dodging, blocking, and blinding effects.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Grand Challenge.

target range.value: 500

effect radius.value: 550 / 500

blurb.value: Fiora reveals all four Vitals on an enemy champion and gains movement speed while near them. If Fiora hits all 4 Vitals or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed over the next few seconds.

description.value: Passive: Duelist's Dance's  bonus movement speed is increased.

description2.value: Active: Fiora challenges the target enemy champion for 8 seconds, highlighting their four Vitals after a 0.5 second delay. While in effect, Duelist's Dance does not identify new Vitals on Fiora's target.

description3.value: While near the target, Fiora gains Duelist's Dance's  bonus movement speed.

description4.value: If she triggers at least one Vital before her target dies, or triggers all four, she creates a Victory Zone that heals all allied units within it for 2 − 5 (based on Vitals hit) seconds.

leveling4.value: Heal Per Second:»80 / 95 / 110 / 125 / 140 (+ 60% bonus AD)«Maximum Heal:400 / 475 / 550 / 625 / 700 (+ 300% bonus AD)

description5.value: Unlike Duelist's Dance, the Vitals will keep on lingering even if Fiora is not nearby.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Grand Challenge is dispelled instantly if targeting a decoy. PENDING FOR TEST: Sion's Glory in Death The damage of this ability scales with Duelist's Dance. Even if Fiora dies, the Victory Zone will trigger so long as she hit at least one Vital and they die before the Vitals wear off. Resurrection effects will not prevent the activation of the Victory Zone. Ally units in stasis will not be healed by the Victory Zone. If Fiora had to first run into cast range, she will automatically receive an attack command on her target after attempting to cast Grand Challenge.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.
